Schedule Your Free AI Visibility Audit

See exactly where you stand before committing. Our 30-minute audit shows what's possible with our two-part system—with no obligation.

We're selective. If you're not ready for honest positioning or your reviews need work, we'll tell you in the audit. No point wasting anyone's time.

What You'll Get in Your Free Audit

Live AI Testing - Watch as we test your business across ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity, and Grok in real-time. See exactly if and how AI mentions your business (or doesn't).

Competitor Analysis - We identify which tourism businesses in your region win AI recommendations and show what they're doing differently.

Network Opportunity Map - We identify 3-5 potential partner businesses in your area perfect for Network Effects implementation.

Honest Positioning Workshop - We help articulate what your business actually is (not what you wish it was) so you attract the right customers.

Custom Roadmap - Get detailed plan showing exactly how we'd implement both parts (Network Effects + AI-Optimised Content) for your specific business.

Realistic ROI Projection - Based on your current traffic, reviews, and our client data, we project expected improvement. Ranges, not guarantees.

No Obligation - The audit is educational, not a sales pitch. You walk away with valuable insights whether you sign up or not.

Get in Touch

We're selective. If you're not ready for honest positioning or your reviews need work, we'll tell you in the audit. No point wasting time.

Or email us directly: ricky@foundonchat.com

What Happens After You Submit?

Step 1: We email you within 24 hours to schedule your 30-minute audit at a time that works.

Step 2: Before the call, we research your business and competitors so the audit is tailored to your situation.

Step 3: During the audit, we screen-share to show live AI testing and walk through exactly what we'd do.

Step 4: After the call, we send summary PDF with all findings, recommendations, and custom roadmap.

Step 5: You decide. If you want to proceed, we start immediately. If not, you keep the insights at no cost.

Common Questions Before Scheduling

Q: Is this really free with no strings attached?

A: Yes. The audit is genuinely educational. We believe if we show what's possible, the value will be obvious. No high-pressure sales tactics.

Q: Do I need to prepare anything for the audit?

A: Just have your website URL ready. Be prepared to talk about your business, target customers, and current marketing challenges. We handle the rest.

Q: Can I bring a business partner or colleague to the audit?

A: Absolutely! If considering Network Partnership, we encourage bringing potential partners so they can see the audit together.

Q: What if I already have an llms.txt file?

A: Perfect! We'll show what it's missing and how our two-part system builds on it. Many clients already have llms.txt when they come to us.

Q: I'm not tech-savvy. Will I understand the audit?

A: Yes. We explain everything in plain English with live demonstrations. No confusing jargon. If you can browse a website, you'll understand.

Q: What if my reviews are below 3.5 stars?

A: We'll be honest. AI optimization won't fix fundamental quality issues—it will expose them faster. We'll help identify what needs fixing first, then come back when you're ready.

Why Tourism Businesses Choose FoundOnChat

"Transparency" - We show exactly what we're doing and why it works before you pay anything.

"Honest Approach" - We admit what doesn't work (technical SEO tricks) and focus on what does (quality content + real partnerships).

"Results Focus" - We track actual AI mentions and bookings, not vanity metrics.

"Two-Part Advantage" - We're the only agency implementing Network Effects + AI-Optimised Content together systematically.

"Australian Expertise" - We understand Australian tourism regions, seasonality, and what travellers actually ask AI.

"90-Day Guarantee" - If you don't see results, we keep working free or refund your fees. Your choice.

When You Shouldn't Contact Us

Your reviews are below 3.5 stars - Fix quality issues first. We can't market you out of bad service.

You want overnight results - AI indexing takes 30-60 days. Network effects compound over months.

You're not ready for honest positioning - If you insist on claiming "boutique premium unique" when you're actually a large commercial operation, we'll clash.

You can't commit to 6+ months - Results show best after 6-12 months. Month-to-month billing, but realistic expectations matter.

Recent Client Wins

Barossa Valley Winery - From invisible to top 3 recommendations in 45 days. 85% booking increase. Positioned honestly as "large operation perfect for tour buses."

Hunter Valley Restaurant - Now recommended alongside wineries in AI responses. 200% increase in wine tour lunches. Stopped claiming "fine dining," started saying "casual wine country bistro."

Blue Mountains Lodge - Dominates "family adventure Blue Mountains" queries. 120% booking increase. Honest positioning: "kid-friendly, not romantic getaway."
